oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cattle-to-cattle transmission of Mycobacterium bovis
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Costello, E.
Doherty, M. L.
Monaghan, M. L.
Quigley, F. C.
O'Reilly, P. F.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mycobacterium bovis
tuberculin test
loose-box
disease transmission
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Twenty steers which were positive to the single intradermal comparative tuberculin test were divided into 10 groups of two, and each pair was housed in an individual loose-box for a year with one steer which was negative in the tuberculin test. Full article published in Veterinary Journal (1998) 155, 245.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1998; 112
